title: 38. "There's Hope" How Inner Child Healing Helps with Self Love
description:
In this episode, we chat about inner child healing and why it's vital to work on it in order to help us on our journey towards self love.

 

Please don't forget to rate & review!

Book of the Month mentioned: Peace from broken pieces by Iyanla Vanzant

Click here to pre-order your copy of the Inner Child Healing Affirmations and Guided Meditations combo pack
